summaryInsights.title: Membership signal
summaryInsights.detail: Membership up ~1.4% QoQ, largely small group and ACA bronze; utilization rising faster than member growth.

summaryInsights.title: Medical cost drivers
summaryInsights.detail: Orthopedic (DRGs 469/470) and GI endoscopy CPTs 45378-45385 leading the spend climb; specialty injectables adding pharmacy pressure.

summaryInsights.title: Provider concentration
summaryInsights.detail: Houston Methodist and Baylor clusters showing unit cost variance above contracts; independent ASC utilization growing in Dallas-Fort Worth.

summaryInsights.title: Policy gap to address
summaryInsights.detail: Strengthen oncology drug prior-auth/step edits and site-of-care for infusion suites; tighten cancer supportive-care drug policies.
